name: Zebalooz
description:
Description:

Garbage became one of the most difficult problems that face our society. If we didn't find a solution for that problem in the simplest case when someone throws a garbage bag from the window it may fall on your head and kill you. This game shows the problem in a funny way.

Controls: 

  •  Arrows: Move Player 
  •  Space: Jump

Credits:

  • Art by: Tomas Barrios
  • Music by: Easyname
